categories.name: Stations
categories.description: All stations monitored within the GLOS HABS Monitoring Network

categories.name: Surface Water Temperature
categories.description: A measure of warmth or coldness of the lake

categories.name: Specific Conductivity
categories.description: A value measuring how electricity moves through the water

categories.name: Turbidity
categories.description: A cloudy condition in water due to suspended silt or organic matter

categories.name: pH
categories.description: A measure of hte acidity or alkalinity of the water.

categories.name: Chlorophyll
categories.description: A chemical mixture or compound that plants use for photosynthesis and gives them their green color
